title: Tech pullback, SEC considers tightening startup investing regulations, Apple XR headset leaks | E1357
description: We cover the tech stock pullback (1:34), discuss the impact of the SEC exploring more restrictions and disclosures for late stage private companies (12:00) and share details about Apple’s mixed reality headset are leaking (37:07). We wrap with a new segment... over/under(45:11)!
